more.about: At Slow and Chill, you will find that even the smallest space can be the comfiest space. Our humble coffee shop not only brings you the best quality of coffee, but also focuses on the overall aesthetic of the shop. Locates in the heart of Saigon, you can enjoy your coffee while looking down at the ever so lively pedestrian street, Nguyen Hue. Our team has one mission: to bring you the tastiest coffee. So whenever you want to start your day with a cup of coffee, remember to stop by us. Take it slow, kickback, and chill.
